resources.string: "Quantum physics is the study of \n matter and energy at an atomic and subatomic level."

"Apparently, objects at a macroscopic level and fundamental level do act differently. 

" "The understanding of these unique characteristics can then be applied 
 to develop our pre-existing technology and methods. 

"
Some essential concepts related to quantum physics include:

"Quantum particles can be in different states at the same time.

 This characteristic is extremely useful for quantum computers.
A quantum computer contains qubits (quantum bits) which represent both binary values (0 and 1) at the same time, \n

allowing certain processes to be done much faster in quantum computers 
 compared to classic computers. 

 (Classic bits can only store either 0 or 1 at a certain time.)"
